attributes.action: Let 18 year olds ride what ever size motorbike on public roads
attributes.additional_details: Let 18 year olds ride what ever size motorbike on public roads because if you turn 18 and get a driving licence if you have the money you can buy what ever car you want  even if its a ferrari, so why should 18 year olds be restricted to 125cc. When you turn 18 you are classed as an adult in the UK therefore you are responsible for yourself and should be allowed to ride what ever motorbike you want as long as it is road legal.
